page.title: 16CONSERVATION AREA IN LINTON
page.content: Linton is one of a small number of Cambridgeshire villages in which the County Council pursues an active conservation policy.This policy has been designed to preserve the picturesque heart of the village, whilst allowing the development of housing estates on the outskirts. However,local concern about the rapid growth of the village has recently caused the County Council to ban further large scale house building, although this decision may have to be reversed in the future if the economic expansion of Cambridgeshire continues at its present rate.
